attributes.additional_details: MILLER ARGENT  have put a planning application in to dig up the area known as Nant Llesg, a 17 and half year project full of dirt dust and noise on top of what everyone already experiences from ffos-y-fran. Our landscape will change forever with the loss of a 200 year old pond with its wonderful wildlife. We ask that you help us stop Miller Argent as this will have an adverse affect on the environment and we need to protect it for future generations.This will be detrimental to our quality of life and well-being, we also need to be supporting local farming industies and protecting biodiversity
